meanings.definition: Of or relating to folic acid.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended a folic supplement for better health.
meanings.sent2: She chose folic-rich foods to support her pregnancy.
meanings.sent3: The folic salad danced on her taste buds with joy.
meanings.sent4: His folic smile brightened the room like sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green of the folic vegetables was a feast for the eyes.

meanings.sent4: Her folic touch brought life to the dull painting.
meanings.sent5: The folic aroma of the soup filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.sent2: She researched the different types of folic for her project.
